content.c_answer2: The Lion King has a run time of 2 hours and 30 minutes, including a 15 minute interval. For a 7:30PM performance, the show will finish at roughly 10:00PM. For a 2:30PM performance, the show will finish at roughly 5:00PM.
content.name: How long is The Lion King and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is The Lion King and when does it finish?
